p.b: This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

tr.td: A string that provides additional detail pertinent to the use or understanding of the concept
The date at which the concept status was last changed
A code that indicates the status of the concept. Typical values are active, experimental, deprecated, and retired

True if the concept is not considered active - e.g. not a valid concept any more. Property type is boolean, default value is false. Note that the status property may also be used to indicate that a concept is inactive

div.p: This code system https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/AnastomosisLeakGrading defines the following codes:

tr.td: Grad A - Kræver ikke nogen form for aktiv terapeutisk behandling
Grad B - Kræver aktiv terapeutisk behandling men ikke re-labaroskopi eller re-laparotomi
Grad C - Kræver aktiv terapeutisk behandling med re-labaroskopi eller re-laparotomi

publisher.value: Sundhedsvæsnets Kvalistetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

name.value: Sundhedsvæsnets Kvalistetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

description.value: A string that provides additional detail pertinent to the use or understanding of the concept
The date at which the concept status was last changed
A code that indicates the status of the concept. Typical values are active, experimental, deprecated, and retired

True if the concept is not considered active - e.g. not a valid concept any more. Property type is boolean, default value is false. Note that the status property may also be used to indicate that a concept is inactive

definition.value: Grad A - Kræver ikke nogen form for aktiv terapeutisk behandling
Grad B - Kræver aktiv terapeutisk behandling men ikke re-labaroskopi eller re-laparotomi
Grad C - Kræver aktiv terapeutisk behandling med re-labaroskopi eller re-laparotomi
